com.aeonphyxius.data

Class PlayerData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aeonphyxius.data.PlayerData

  • public class PlayerData
extends Object
    PlayerData Object.

    Player information.

    This class encapsulates all information related to the video game player (lives, damage, shields, points.... etc).

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alejandro Santiago
